title: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, Vol. 9: Demon
description: Zayne and Gryph are finally learning the truth about their fierce friend Jarael and the strange Mandalorian deserter Rohlan. Deception has been company to the foursome since Zayne's life as a fugitive banded them together, and for one of Zayne's companions, a resurfacing past brings deadly peril.Collects Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic #47-50
author: John Jackson Miller
